CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Borealis Township relative to Aethelgard City?
SRP.A: Borealis Township is {below} Aethelgard City in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Azure Coast relative to Borealis Township?
SRP.A: Azure Coast is {above} Borealis Township in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Azure Coast relative to Stellar Expanse?
SRP.A: Azure Coast is {above} Stellar Expanse in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total energy consumption per capita?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Azure Coast}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total energy consumption per capita?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Silverhaven District}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Borealis Township's minimum Energy Consumption per Capita in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Borealis Township's minimum Energy Consumption per Capita is in {1990}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Meridian Territory's minimum Energy Consumption per Capita in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Meridian Territory's minimum Energy Consumption per Capita is in {1977}.

NC.Q: Between 1981 and 1984, was the average total Energy Consumption per Capita higher or lower than between 1983 and 1987?
NC.A: The average total energy consumption per capita between 1981 and 1984 was {higher} than between 1983 and 1987.

NC.Q: Between 1979 and 1988, was the average total Energy Consumption per Capita higher or lower than between 1978 and 1988?
NC.A: The average total energy consumption per capita between 1979 and 1988 was {lower} than between 1978 and 1988.

NC.Q: Was the total Energy Consumption per Capita in 1983 higher or lower than in 1987?
NC.A: The total energy consumption per capita in 1983 was {higher} than in 1987.

NC.Q: Between 1988 and 1990, was the average total Energy Consumption per Capita higher or lower than between 1983 and 1989?
NC.A: The average total energy consumption per capita between 1988 and 1990 was {higher} than between 1983 and 1989.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Azure Coast} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Azure Coast and Silverhaven District first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Azure Coast and Silverhaven District first exchanged leading positions in {1978}.
